attributes.action: Allow English citizens the same rights as Scottish citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As part of the UNITED KINGDOM, English citizens should be granted the same rights as Scottish citizens, ie free subscriptions and university fees should be abolished.  In addition, English MPs should be able to vote in Scottish affairs or, Scottish MPs should have no vote in English affairs

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
